医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
长时间的REM睡眠潜伏期与阿尔茨海默氏病生物标志物有关研究表明，更长的REM潜伏期与较高的阿尔茨海默氏症的生物标志物有关，表明其潜力是神经变性的早期指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/prolonged-remonged-rem-sleep-latency-latency-to-to-alzheimere28099s-disease-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/prolonged-remonged-rem-sleep-latency-latency-to-to-alzheimere-to-alzheimere28099s-disease-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6074c49-2864-47d9-9276-7a7417a30885 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 05:11:00 -0500 Prolonged REM sleep latency linked to Alzheimer’s disease biomarkers
瑞典的研究揭示了早产儿的疼痛管理差距早产儿的疼痛研究表现出频繁的疼痛程序和不足的疼痛管理，强调需要更好的评估策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/swedish-study-reveals-gaps-gaps-n-pain-management-management-for-preterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/swedish-study-reveals-gaps-gaps-gaps-in-pain-management-management-for-preterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe9a331-8DDB-4117-BD2E-97E0A0A03A7AC8 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 04:25:00 -0500 Swedish study reveals gaps in pain management for preterm infants
菜单上的卡路里标签伤害饮食失调的人根据今天在BMJ公共卫生中发表的一项新研究，餐厅菜单上的卡路里标签正在对饮食失调症患者产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/calorie-labels-on-menus-harm-harm-people-with-eating-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/calorie-labels-on-menus-harm-harm-people-with-eating-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85a44444444780-47CD-87D0-39DE6BA09385 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 01:12:08 -0500 Calorie labels on menus harm people with eating disorders
调查显示，美国对儿童疫苗要求的看法发生了变化唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在竞选期间威胁要对儿童进行学校疫苗的规定，一项新调查发现，近四分之三的美国成年人支持要求儿童接种可预防的疾病，例如麻疹，腮腺炎和风疹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-reveals-shift-shift-shift-in-us-views-on-childhood-childhood-vaccine-vaccine-requirnements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-reveals-shift-shift-shift-in-sin-us-views-on-childhood-childhood-vaccine-vaccine-requirements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fcac8b8-c4e5-4834-B846-063DF2459C05 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 01:03:14 -0500 Survey reveals shift in U.S. views on childhood vaccine requirements

Trilobio在SLAS2025介绍了全劳动自动化平台Trilobio是用于推进生物学研究的整个实验室自动化解决方案的开发商，今天在实验室自动化和筛选会议会议上，SLAS2025与飞行员客户数据一起介绍了其全面的机器人技术，实验室设备和软件平台的首个版本，并展示了该平台的能力推进研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/trilobio-intrododuces-whole-loboration-automation-automation-platform-atform-at-slas2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/trilobio-intrododuces-whole-lale-laboration-automation-automation-platform-at-slas2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cc4b17f-6463-4484-a93d-b662d51137d0 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 23:56:00 -0500 Trilobio introduces whole-laboratory automation platform at SLAS2025

适度的运动有助于控制肥胖男人的食欲最近的一项研究涉及默多克大学健康期货研究所的研究人员，表明中等强度的运动可以显着影响与食欲相关的激素和肥胖男性的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/moderate-eccise-helps-control-appetite-in----in-obese-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/moderate-exercise-helps-chelps-control-appetite-in----in-obese-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=447f0452-AB51-41D9-826C-0D1EC6F3E752 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 23:37:51 -0500 Moderate exercise helps control appetite in obese men
